MenorahBoard.setAll: Set all pixels to same color - INTERNAL USE ONLY
MenorahBoard.setAllCandles: Set all candles to the same color - INTERNAL USE ONLY
MenorahBoard.setAllFlames: Set all flames to the same color - INTERNAL USE ONLY
MenorahBoard.setAllMenorahBaseLights: Set all menorah base lights to the same color - INTERNAL USE ONLY
MenorahBoard.setBrightness: Set brightness for all LEDs (0-255) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
MenorahBoard.setCandle:
Set color of a candle (1-9, left to right) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
Candle 1 = leftmost, Candle 5 = shammash (middle), Candle 9 = rightmost
MenorahBoard.setFlame:
Set color of a flame (1-9, left to right) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
Flame 1 = leftmost, Flame 9 = rightmost
MenorahBoard.setMenorahBaseLight:
Set color of a menorah base light (1-9, row by row, left to right) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
Base Light 1 = top left, Base Light 9 = bottom center
MenorahBoard.setPixelColor: Set color of pixel at index (0-26) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
MenorahBoard.show: Update the LED strip - INTERNAL USE ONLY
input:
Respond to and read data from buttons and sensors.

Events and data from sensors.
menorah.allBaseLightNumbers: Get list of all base light numbers (1-9)
menorah.allCandleNumbers: Get list of all candle numbers (1-9)
menorah.allFlameNumbers: Get list of all flame numbers (1-9)
menorah.candleNumbersExceptShammash: Get list of candle numbers except shammash (1-4, 6-9)
menorah.flameNumbersExceptShammash: Get list of flame numbers except shammash (1-4, 6-9)
menorah.initMotionSensor: Initialize the motion sensor - call this once at the start
menorah.isMotionDetected: Check if motion is detected - returns true if someone moved nearby
menorah.setAll: Set all pixels to same color
menorah.setAllCandles: Set all Menorah candles to the same color
menorah.setAllFlames: Set all Menorah flames to the same color
menorah.setAllMenorahBaseLights: Set all menorah base lights to the same color
menorah.setCandle:
Set color of a Menorah candle (1-9, left to right)
Candle 1 = leftmost, Candle 5 = shammash (middle), Candle 9 = rightmost
menorah.setFlame:
Set color of a Menorah flame (1-9, left to right)
Flame 1 = leftmost, Flame 9 = rightmost
menorah.setMenorahBaseLight:
Set color of a menorah base light (1-9, row by row, left to right)
Base Light 1 = top left, Base Light 9 = bottom center
menorah.setPixelColor: Set color of pixel at index (0-26)
